description: In its latest reveal, the varying gameplay from both playable characters of Naoe, a shinobi from Iga, and Yasuke, a Samurai under Oda Nobunaga, was showcased. Assassin's Creed Shadows is the latest entry into the longrunning AC franchise, following up Assassin's Creed Mirage and Assassins' Creed Valhalla.
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Gives Players Two Unique Ways to Play.

description:
Join Star Wars Outlaws' Associate Narrative Director John Bjorling as he breaks down all the little details you might have missed in our Official Gameplay Showcase. Learn more about Kay's speeder, blaster, and her ship, the Trailblazer; and spot Easter eggs in the Akiva system and on Tatooine. 

#starwarsoutlaws #starwars #ubisoft
title: Star Wars Outlaws Official Gameplay Deep Dive | Ubisoft Forward 2024

description:
Assassin's Creed Shadows' Game Director Charles Benoit and Art Director Thierry Dansereau showcase how combat and stealth are evolving as they break down the first official gameplay reveal for Assassin's Creed Shadows. Learn more about the new samurai melee combat moves that allow Yasuke to overpower his foes and the new shinobi stealth tools that make Naoe the stealthiest Assassin yet.

#assassinscreedshadows #assassinscreed #ubisoft
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Official Gameplay Deep Dive | Ubisoft Forward 2024

description:
In the latest Assasin's Creed, Shadows, players will enter feudal Japan, with players taking control of a female shinobi from Iga, Naoe, and the samurai, Yasuke. To introduce Assassins' Creed Shadows, Ubisoft had the Taiko Project perform, and then later showed an extended look at gameplay.

Charles Benoit the game director sets the stage for the what to expect in Assassin's Creed Shadows, some new gameplay mechanics and more.

#assassinscreedshadows #ubisoft #gaming
title: Assassin's Creed Shadows Full Presentation | Ubisoft Forward 2024

description:
Watch over 12 minutes of work in progress gameplay from Assassin’s Creed Shadows, coming out November 15. 

Become a lethal shinobi Assassin and a samurai of historical legend as you fight for justice in turbulent feudal Japan. 

Timestamps
0:00 - 0:17: Intro
0:18 – 3:50: Exploring Fukuchiyama
3:52 - 6:02: Yasuke Combat Gameplay
6:03 - 7:37: Naoe & Yasuke Cinematic Look
7:38 – 11:37: Naoe Stealth Combat Gameplay
11:38 - 12:16: Naoe Escape Gameplay
12:17 - 13:02  Open-World Look
title: 12 Minutes of Assassin's Creed Shadows Extended Gameplay Showcase | Ubisoft Forward 2024

description:
This new gameplay walkthrough video follows Kay Vess on a mission to Mos Eisley to track down an expert gunslinger. Kay takes on a mission to uncover a mysterious gunslinger in the Outer Rim in Star Wars Outlaws.

Coming August 30th, 2024.

#starwarsoutlaws #starwars #ubisoft

description: David Hayter; the voice of Solid Snake, Naked Snake, and Big Boss, introduces new mechanics and graphical improvements coming to METAL GEAR SOLID Δ: SNAKE EATER in the latest installment of the Metal Gear Solid Legacy series.
title: METAL GEAR SOLID Legacy Series Part 2: MGS Delta Snake Eater | ft. David Hayter

description: Are you excited for Metal Gear Solid Delta: Snake Eater?
title: METAL GEAR SOLID 3 Remake vs Original Comparison

description:
ID Software's Marty Stratton and Hugo Martin join us to share more details on the upcoming DOOM: The Dark Ages, which was revealed as part of the 2024 Xbox Games Showcase.

DOOM: The Dark Ages wants to fill your screen with more than three times the enemies, and massively opens up the world to exploration, all while letting you ride giant dragons and pilot enormous mechs.

Featuring classic weapons like the Super Shotgun, and introducing new ones like the Skullcrusher, DOOM: The Dark Ages' combat is much more grounded and tankier than other DOOM games, and not just because the Doomslayer is wielding a brutal chainsaw shield.
title: DOOM: The Dark Ages Taps Into Classic DOOM To Create Something New | Summer Game Fest 2024

description:
During Sumer Game Fest 2024, we got to play the first 40 minutes of the upcoming post-apocalyptic survival FPS, S.T.A.L.K.E.R 2: Heart of Chornobyl. 

S.T.A.L.K.E.R 2 impressed us with its sense of scale, intricate details, gameplay mechanics and the overall vibe of Chornobyl's harsh and irradiated world. However the brutal difficulty for which the S.T.A.L.K.E.R games are known made our short journey exploring The Zone a perilous one. 

S.T.A.L.K.E.R. 2: Heart of Chornobyl releases on Xbox Series X|S and PC on September 5, 2024.
title: The Details of S.T.A.L.K.E.R 2: Heart of Chornobyl Blew Us Away | Summer Game Fest 2024

description: Lucy and Tam are joined by Chris Benoit the Game Director for Assassin's Creed Shadows to learn more about how the team has worked on finding a balance between historical facts and fiction in their latest installment in the Assassin's Creed Franchise.
title: How Assassin's Creed Shadows Finds the Balance Between Fact and Fiction | GameSpot Summer Live
